text: Neo is the main character of The Matrix franchise. He is portrayed by Keanu Reeves. ==Biography== Thomas A. Anderson is a hacker. He was given a call from Morpheus to take either a red pill or a blue pill. Neo took the red pill and got into the real world. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999 Category:The Matrix characters Category:Superheroes
title: Neo (The Matrix)
